snippet: High-income households would get tax cuts under a system like the one Mitt Romney is proposing, the Tax Policy Center found.
abstract: Tax Policy Center analysis suggests that a tax system overhaul along the lines of what Mitt Romney has proposed would give big tax cuts to high-income households and increase the tax burden on middle- and lower-income households.
lead_paragraph: High-income households would get tax cuts under a system like the one Mitt Romney is proposing, the Tax Policy Center found.

headline.seo: Romney Tax Plan Would Burden Lower-Income Households
headline.main: Plan Like Romney’s Would Tax Rich Less
headline.print_headline: Plan Like Romney’s Would Tax Rich Less
